Aha! Another piece of evidence! This problem only occurs on windows 8/8.1, not on window's 7. (Can't say about windows 10)

My test was run on a PC running Windows 8

To reproduce:

1. Open Google Chrome to the following page: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-1-0-4

2. Click any spoiler. For results shown in pic, click the spoiler directly under the text beginning with "One of the Numbers on the Communotron 88-88..."

3. Close said spoiler.

4. Observe changes.

* It would appear that each individual spoiler causes specific lines of text to disappear, rather than random lines. If the same spoiler is opened and closed multiple times, the same text will appear and disappear each time.

Edit: Also including pic of pre-spoiler-opening procedure.
